gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 105, Suns 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers clinch a spot in the NBA Playoffs as they defeat the Suns, 105-92. Paul George led the way for the Clippers with 23 points, seven rebounds and five assists, while Russell Westbrook added 16 points, a season-high 15 rebounds and 15 assists in the victory, his 1st triple-double of the season and 199th of his career. This is Westbrooks first triple-double since 1/15/23 against the 76ers. Kevin Durant tallied 21 points for the Suns in the losing effort. The Clippers win their fourth straight game as they improve to 51-28 on the season, while the Suns fall to 46-33.
